Project Description
The LinkLabel control allows you to put hyperlinks in any given text in Silverlight. It recognizes URLs in the text (like http://...) as well as can use regular expressions to define custom links.

Example
"LinkLabel control represents a Silverlight TextBlock control that can contain [link="http://www.silverlightshow.net" target="_blank"]links[/link] defined either by a user defined pattern or with their URI like http://www.silverlightshow.net"

This will make "links" and "http://www.silverlightshow.net" hyperlinks.
The regular expressions can be defined by the user directly from the XAML. Thanks to Harlequin, a target attribute can also be added to the custom defined links.

Check out the original article http://www.silverlightshow.net/items/Silverlight-LinkLabel-control.aspx how to build this control published on SilverlightShow.net
